text:
e="preserve">Carlton Lee Haselrig (January 22, 1966 – July 22, 2020) was an American heavyweight wrestler and NFL player. Haselrig wrestled for University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown. Haselrig then moved on to professional football, where he played five seasons in the NFL. He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers and the New York Jets. Haselrig was born in Johnstown, Pennsylvania.
Haselrig died on July 22, 2020 in Johnstown, aged 54.
